description: MagicSlides.app is AI-Powered Text To Presentation app that creates presentation slides from any piece of text.
title: AI Presentation Maker - Presentation from Topic, YouTube, PDF, URL with AI
keywords: ai presentation maker,ai presentation software,auto generate presentation,free ai presentation generator,free ai presentation maker,ai ppt maker,ai slides,PowerPoint presentation ai,text to ppt ai,ai PowerPoint presentation,ai slide generator
introduction: Professional Presentations in Seconds with AI. Just Enter Topic, Youtube URL, PDF, or Text to get a beautiful PPT in seconds. Use the bulb for AI suggestions. 2878+ presentations created in the last 24 hours.
features: Convert YouTube videos, PDFs, and text to PPT presentations
Different presentation limits based on the plan
targetPeople: Users who need to create professional presentations quickly

faqs.question: What is AskPPT?
faqs.answer: AskPPT is a feature that allows users to chat and get assistance while creating presentations.

faqs.question: How many presentations can I create with the Premium plan?
faqs.answer: The Premium plan allows for unlimited standard presentations with a 12,000 character limit and up to 10 slides, as well as 600 premium presentations per year with a 50,000 character limit and up to 50 slides.
